choices: A doctor spots you, and takes you into the hospital.
A car stops, and picks you up.
You decide to just leave the street, and wander around.
1.content:
You wake with absolute fear on your face.


For the past nine years, you have been afraid to go to sleep at night. Every night you dream, about something good, or bad, and every morning when you wake, you dream has come true. You are visiting your very sick mother in the hospital, and had fallen asleep in her hospital room.


Tears running down your face, you know that your mother is dead. In your dream you saw her laying there, dead, when a nurse comes in and covers your mothers head.


You don't even try to talk to your mom, you know what has happened. That's when a nurse comes in and covers your mom's head with sheets.


You stare at the covered body. ''I shouldn't have gone to sleep.'' You say quietly to yourself. ''I'm sorry, momma. I let you down.''


You turn from the body, and walk out of the room. You roam the halls, feeling like you should be the one dead. ''I dreamed my mother into death.''You thought to yourself. ''I can't let this happen again.''

You run out of the hospital, and out into the open road. You stand there just hoping a car will hit you. What happens?
1.title: I'm sorry momma.

11.content:
A doctor standing outside spots you, and quickly takes you inside.
''What were you thinking?'' The doctor asked.''You could have been killed.''

''That's what I was hoping would happen.'' You reply.

''You need some help.'' He says. He takes you down into the hospitals basement, and into a room, where a man sat. The doctor left you there with the man.

''What seems to be the problem?'' The man askes.
''Well, my dreams comes true.'' You say seriously. The man...
11.title: My dreams come true

111.content:
You expect him to laugh, but when he doesn't, you look at him curiously.

"You mean, you have visions?" he asked.

"No, it's just every time I fall asleep my dreams become real when I wake up."

"Do you ever have dreams about fairytales and such?"

"No, they're mostly about real stuff."

"Then I was right, they're not normal dreams, they're visions, visions of the future."

"What? That's impossible, no one can see the future."

"How wrong you are child, long ago there was a secret society, they could see the future in their dreams. For reasons unknown, only women have this power."

"This society, what was their purpose?"

"At first they had no purpose, but there is a comfort in being with others like you. They experimented with their powers, and soon, they didn't have to sleep to have visions.
"One day, they all had the same vision at the same time. They all saw great evil prepared to rule the world. They dedicated their lives to stopping this evil, but their vision of the evil never came to pass. They were perplexed, for it was the first time they were wrong." he said

"So what? That proves that their powers failed that it never really existed."

"Oh how wrong you are. That evil wasn't false. It just wasn't coming as quickly as they thought. You see, this evil comes from the Shadow World, a place in the realms of Chaos, where all fear to tread. The Shadows were merely biding their time for an appropriate moment to attack, with the Seers, as they were soon called, always ready for an attack, they could not get through undetected. Now that the Seers no longer believe they have power to do anything, the Shadows are coming through the barrier between our world and theirs."

"What does this have to do with me?"

"Learn to use your powers, then call to them, call to the Seers. Make them fight for us."

"Us? Who is 'us'?" you ask him.

"The world, the innocent people." he replies.

"How can I protect the world when I can't even protect myself?"

"You'll find a way, you'll have to, if you want to survive."

"Sure, whatever," you say as you get up to leave.

"Meet back here tomarrow." he says.

"Uh-huh," you say absentmindedly. You leave the hospital, but when look over your shoulder you see the man talking on his cell phone. You see him mouth the words "I got her. This girl is the one you need. Yes sir, I will."

You realize that this man is working against you. He himself said only women were Seers, so he couldn't be talking to someone asscociated with them if it was a man he as talking with.

Should you investigate, pretend you saw nothing and meet him, or never go anywhere near him again?
111.title: The Seers

1112.content:
You decide to just forget about what happend and stay away from the doctor and the hospital. You take out your cell phone and call for a friend to pick you up.

You arrive at your friends house. Your friend's name is Michael. He is your exboyfriend, but has always been there for you. He tells you that you can sleep in his room, and that he'll sleep on the couch. You politley accept and find yourself in his room. You lay in the bed, wondering where you can go. All of your family is dead. Then........you start thinking about the doctor. Are these "seers" real, you ask yourself? Suddenly, there is a large crash downstairs in the living room. You run outside of your room and quickly make your way into the living room. There is no one on the couch. Where is Michael?

You......
1112.title: Trying to Forget

choices: The elevator stops, trapping you inside.
A strange man comes out from the shadows of the elevator.
112.content:
''What?!'' The man laughed. ''Ok. Tell me more about these 'dreams'. He said joking.

''I knew you wouldn't understand, nobody believes me.''

''I believe you, yeah.''

You slam your hands on the desk in rage,''You know when Sara Lane died in the car crash? I dreamt that Sara Lane died in a car crash the night before. You remember when Jacob Cotts died in the fire when his house burnt down, I dreamt that the night before. What I dream comes true.''

The man stared at you like you were some crazy person who escaped jail.

''Why should I listen to you? No one listens to me.''

You walk out of the room and slam the door. You go up the same elevator that brought you down, when suddenly...
112.title: elevator

choices: The elevator cable breaks, sending the car crashing down
Your mother's spirit helping you out
1121.content: The descending numbers stop. It is so subtle, you don't notice it at first. But after a few seconds you notice that you've been on the third floor awhile. You also note that the humming noise of the moving elevator has stopped. You're not that worried at first, thinking that someone's on their way to rescue you, but after about five minutes you start to panic. "Help!" you shout desperately, even though you know no one can hear you. The elevator is bear except for the floor numbers and override keyhole, so there is nothing you can do. You sit down on the floor, and suddenly tired from the day's hectic events, fall asleep. You dream about...
1121.title: Stuck

choices: Ask the man a few questions
11212.content:
You start to dream that You mother comes and says to you that there is a secert passage in the floor. Then you dream that you open that passage and get out on the 2nd floor. You find yourself standing there on the 2nd floor when a man comes and grabs you and says i know what you are looking for. Then suddenly you wake up and the events follow as you dreamed. This man you cannot see his face but you know that he can be trusted you dont know how.
Suddenly you are out side do you
11212.title: Escape

1122.content:
As you approach the elevators they open and a man walks out and eyes you while whispering "I believe you," and as you think about what he has whispered you quickly turn around and he is gone.

Dissmissing the interaction, thinking now you are dreaming while awake, you feel compelled to find help from an old friend that you grew up with.

Along the way to see him you stop at a coffee shop as you are feeling tired and not wanting to dream you buy the strongest cup of mud the local staryucks has to offer, as you are paying for your mud, you hear the whisper again, "I believe you," and you turn around and no one is there...
1122.title: I believe

choices: Ask a cashier where the portrait came from.
Run out of the shop, and head onward to your friends house.
11221.content:
"What" You say, turning back around to the cashier.
"I believe you forgot your change, miss."
The cashier says.
"Oh yeah, thanks." You go and sit down at a far away table, and start to drink your coffee. When a painting on the wall catches your eye. You stare at it, unable to remove your gaze.
The painting is of a middle aged man, with an old military suit on. He seemed to be staring right at you. That was only the slightly weird thing. The other thing is, underneath the portrait, in a gold sheet, read the words, "I believe you."

This scares you, and a passing sole, upsets you gaze. what do you do next?
11221.title: The portrait

112211.content:
The Cashier says that she had never seen that picture before.
YOu start to walk toward it
" Who is it what are they try to say?" you said this out loud. The people around you start to look fussy like they are vanishing
112211.title: Vanishing

choices: See what is at the end of the tunnel
Talk to the person beside you
12.content:
You distinctly remember the headlights coming closer and closer, growing brighter and brighter. You heard the tires screeching to a halt. Too late. All is black...
"Casidy..." you hear someone call your name. You know that voice.
"Momma!" you call out into the nothingness that surround you.
You see a wispy figure off in the distance; it is waving at you. You get up and run toward the figure and before you can really confirm it was your mother, it wisps away leaving you in silence...and lonely. Eyes burning, tears trickling down your face, you look around desperately and find a tunnel. You notice that it is dark and uninviting, but with a tiny spec of light at the end. It seems to be your only way out of here--wherever here is. Then you see someone standing off to your side....
12.title: A Lucid Dream World

choices: Tell the doctor your father caused your mother's death.
Be silent and leave the hopital with your father.
121.content:
You enter the dark tunnel, almost certain it was your mother you saw.

A voice says, "Wake up baby!"

"Mama, is that you?" you call. The darkness begins to engulf you as you go father down the tunnel, the light behind you is fading and the light ahead is still so distant.

"Come to me baby." a voice says.

"Mama, I'm so sorry, you died because of me." Tears fall freely from your eyes, blurring your vision even more.

"No honey, it's not your fault. Please don't blame yourself." said the voice of your mother. "What you have is a gift. You don't make the future, you only see what has already been written."

The darkness around you is almost complete. If it were not for the light ahead, you would be lost. The image of the figure at the end of the tunnel seems a little clearer.

"But Mama, you died!" You collapse to the floor in sorrow. You feel guilty despite your mothers words.

"Please don't blame yourself, it was your father who brought this on me, not you." your mother's voice said. "Please wake up baby."

You tried to talk but the words didn't want to come. Finally you wipe your eyes and take a deep breath. "Dad?" you ask confused. Your sadness starts turning to anger.

With renewed strength you find the will to stand. "But why mom?" The image of the person at the end of the tunnel disappears and you only see light. You run towards the light, pushing yourself to go as fast as you can. "Mom, don't go! Please, I love you, just tell me why!"

"Wake up baby."

You run as fast and the light gets closer and closer.

"I think she's coming to." a voice says. The light is almost blinding.

"That's it baby, wake up."

You wake up.

Before you a doctor is waving is pen-light in your eyes, behind him is a nurse and your father.

"She's a very lucky girl! Other than a mild concussion she's alright, just a couple of scrapes and bruises." the doctor said. "I don't see any reason you can't take her home."

"Thank you so much doctor" your father said. "I'm sure she's eager to get home as soon as she can." He then turns to you and says, "Come on baby, let's go home."
121.title: Chapter 3

choices: Spend the Night at the Hosptial
Go home with your dad and get some rest
1211.content:
Leave with him? A pit of various poision snakes sounds more like an inviting home than anywhere your "Dad" will be.

"Doctor!" You frantically whisper. No Response so you yank down hard on his swinging stethoscope. Check, you have his attention.

"Casidy, really, you could've gotten my attention another way," he rasps.

"Doctor,my Dad, No no, that horrible man killed my mother." I plead tring to make him understand.

He shakes his head and cocks it slightly to the side. Clicking the pen in his hand he walks over to my father and whispers in his ear. Both of them look at me, my face begins to burn red and I gently lean over, holding my hands in my head.

The Doctor swiftly walks back,
"Cassidy I think you should.."
1211.title: A desperate attempt

choices: ..tell her to Stop!  There is a killer out there!
let her keep going, if she distracts your father..maybe you can escape!
12111.content:
The doctor looks at you and says "Cassiday, I think you better spend the night in the hospital".

You are overcome with excitement and you thank the doctor. A nurse guides you to an elevator while the doctor talks to your father. While in the elevator, you faint.

You are awoken in a bed on the bottom floor by the nurse. She hands you some pills and tells you that the father was taken in by police and that the doctor left a short while ago. You take the pill and lie back down in your bed as the nurse leaves the room. You think about how your father could've killed your mother, and how you can make sure your father rots in jail. Right before you fall asleep, you hear the nurse scream from a distance. You jump out of your bed and into the hallway. There, you see your father impale the nurse with a stake and stick her on the wall. She dies. You scream and run in the opposite direction. Your father runs after you.

Father, "I don't know how you found out you little bastard, but you're not getting away".

You run faster, but you slip and fall. Your head hits the floor of the hospital and you are awoken by the nurse.

You realize it was all a dream, but the nurse is in danger. As she walks out of the room, you.......
12111.title: The hospital

121111.content:
Before she leaves the room, you yell "STOP! My father is out there!! He broke out of jail!!"

The nurse is puzzled.

Nurse, "How do you know this?.......is it some kind of joke because it is not funny!"

Suddenly, a dark figure appears behind her. You scream and point at it. The nurse turns around to see him. He grabs her and throws her into the hall. You hear her scream and run out........just like the dream...... You see her being impaled and stuck into the wall, you turn around and run. You remember that you are going to slip right when you do. You hit the ground, but you don't wake up. You quickly get back up and run through the front door. You run into the middle of the road when you..........
121111.title: Uh-oh

choices: You run down the sewer, away from your father.
1211112.content:
You fall into a pothole. You hit your back hard and groan. The sewer is dark, but you stay so you can hide from you dad. Wait! You have your mom's cell phone. You take it out of your pocket and dial "911".

"Hello?", asks the 911 operator.

"Help me!", you whisper, "I'm in a sewer and my father just killed a nurse at the Warren Memorial Hospital".

"Ok, we'll get inforcements there soon", replies the operator.

You hang up your phone to hear your father speak, "Hello, Cassidy".
1211112.title: Sewer

12111121.content: You run down the sewer, away from your father. You drop your cell phone and its breaks in half. You hear a hugh splash behind you and realize your father is behind you. You see a ladder leading up somewhere.
12111121.title: Sewer Run

121111211.content:
Panting and out of breath, you reach for the first rung. Your hands are slippery with sweat, and you can't get a grip on it. You finally pull yourself up and just escape the groping hands of your father, only to be stopped at the very top. Your dad has a firm grip around your waist, and you can't move.
"Gotcha!" He grunts, trying to pull you down. Your hands slip again, and you regrip.
"Stop!" you cry, your throat burning. "No! No! I want this to all be a dream! Or wait!" You lift your eyes heavenward as your father still tries to pull you down. You then utter your final, despairing words. "Mama, take me to you."
Your hand slips one last time, and your father loses his balance. You and your father begin your descent, your father fighting you, you laying still. Midway you flip positions, and you are on the bottom, rushing to meet the ground. The last thing you see is his wide, surprised eyes staring into yours. Then you feel a tremendous pressure on your back, and all is silent.

Something soft touches your leg, but it is not irritating; it is rather pleasant. You roll over on the warm surface. You hear a giggle. You know that laugh. Could it be?
"Wake up, baby."
You open your eyes to your mother's smiling face. Your heart fills with an irrepressible joy. You don't see the purple forget-me-nots you are lying in, nor the clear blue, beautiful sky overhead. All you can see is your mother's face. You are home at last.
121111211.title: The Ladder

121111212.content: You keep running, as fast as you can. A huge blast goes off and a bullet rams into the wall. Another shot is heard, and you feel a sharp pain at the end of your ear. You immediatly grab it, feeling the blood swelling from the lobe. Another bullet is shot, but misses, then another miss. You hear your father pick up speed, and as you look back he pulls the trigger. A bullet enters the back of your leg and you fall to the hard ground, your head and the gravel meshing. This man steps over you and looks into your eyes. You see the pain emerging from his pupils and he raises the gun..and..
121111212.title: The End of One

1211112122.content: He shoots you right in the shoulder.Then you hear another shot its not from your father but from someone behind him. As your father falls to the ground you hear foot steps. Not steps of boots but of high heels... of women?? Can this be?? Its too dark to tell of her face but you lie there in pian not willing to move or speak. The women sginals and a van comes around the corner. @ men hop out and carry you in the van. Then...
1211112122.title: The Women

choices: ..you walk over to it and take his gun, then walk up the ladder.
12111122.content:
"Wassup, papa bear?", you say. "Papa Bear" pulls out his gun and points it at you.

"Even if you do shoot me, you're still going to jail..the police know everything."

"They'll never catch me", he replies, "..police are stupid morons. All they do is..."

A gun goes off. Your father bends over as a tear falls from his eye. You can see a woman behind him, with a gun in her hand...smoke rising out of the barrell. The man you once called your father is lying on the ground, still and silent. You step over him and walk toward the heroine.

"Who are you?"

"Don't worry about that..your'e safe now and that's all that matters."

The darkness of the sewer sheilds her face from your curious eyes..she steps back, evading your view. You turn around to look at the righteous corpse....
12111122.title: The Guardian Angel

choices: Wait for the soda and chips.
1212.content:
Your head is throbbing from your injury and all you can think of is going to sleep.

Your father asks you about what happened outside the hospital.

Your answers are short, your tone is cold and guarded.

You can tell that he feels that something is wrong.

For now, you choose to play along with him until you get more answers.

"I have to get some cofee. Do you want anything?" he asks as he pulls in a station along the road.

"Yeah, just a sprite...and some chips." you tell him in a whisper holding your head.

You watch him go inside.

There is a long line and he will be waiting for a while. You notice him smiling at some young blond bimbo.

He sure is in a good mood comsidering all thats happened.

You look down at the ignition....
He has left the keys in it.

"It would serve him right if I left his a$$ here.

I need to find out whats going on." you think.
1212.title: The Ride Home

choices: A gun with bloody fingure prints on it
12122.content: I will wait and look around and see if i cant find out what happened. You know that he wont be back for awhile so you start to snoop. You frist look in the glove box and what you find is shocking it almost takes your breath away. What you find is
12122.title: Glove boxes can be dangerous

choices: A nurse comes in, disturbing her
There is an explosion in another part of the building, and she runs away
122.content:
You turn. At first, the honey ringlets, crystal blue eyes, and round baby face look familiar, but you can't grasp it. You watch as the child slowly brings up her hand and reveals a glistening dagger. You gasp, wondering what this could mean, but suddenly the phantom vanishes, just like your mother, and only its crystal blue eyes can be seen...
You wake up in a hospital bed, the same one in which your mother died. There is no one in the room. You sit back, waiting. Suddenly, a shadow falls upon the door. You know instantly who it is. A little girl about four or five years old walks in, and you can see she is hiding something under her pink jacket. She walks up to your bedside and stares into your eyes. Neither of you say anything. She begins to bring up her hand, just like in your dream, when suddenly...
122.title: Blue Eyes

choices: You wait for the police and try to explain what happened
1221.content:
You see the little girl walk up to the nurse but the nurse pays no attention to her, like the nurse cant even see her.

The nurse asks you how you are feeling and you reply with a simple answer "fine."

Suddenly you see the little girl pull the knife out of her hand and slowly raise it to the nurses stomach and shove it in.

The nurse doubles over screaming and falls to the ground asking you for help, but the little girl looks at you with the most evil eyes you have ever seen and you suddenly know not to do anything.

Another nurse that overheard the scream comes in but does not notice the girl either. She looks at you and screams "How could you do this?".

The little girl stabs her to, then locks the door. She asks you to go with her, but you hesitate. Then she says "You can either come with me or you can wait for the police to show up and take you to jail."
1221.title: Double Kill

choices: Get out as quickly as posssible,and wait until you wake up.
Try to put out the fire yourself.
12211.content: You slowly climb out of the hospital bed. As you walk up to the door you hear a loud commotion on the other side."Oh great,how will we get out now"? You look at the little girl and she looks as though she already has an idea."Well,there's always the window". You pause for a moment,shocked."ARE YOU CRAZY!?THAT DROP COULD KILL ME"! The little girl gives you an evil glare."That car could have killed you,but you're still alive".The commotion outside the door got louder.You walk over to the window,then stop as you look out."Come on already".You still don't move. The little girl put on one of the most menacing faces you've ever seen."JUMP"she screamed,and without hesitation you jump. You black out when you make contact with the ground. In your dream you are inside a familiar house. Your house. It was exactly the same."Casidy".You pause and listen."Casidy,come quickly".You frantically run upstairs to where momma's voice seems to be coming from."I'm coming momma,I'm coming". You reach momma's room,but she isn't there."Momma? Where are you".Where momma should have been,there stood the little girl."Momma's not here anymore".The girl pulled out a match,and before you could blink the house was in flames.
12211.title: Jumping and Dream Fires

choices: Mrs. Harper goes with the stranger
Mrs. Harper runs from the stranger
13.content:
I hear the brakes come screeching to a halt. I barely lift my head to see who it is. "Mrs. Harper, you may want to come with me."

"Who are you? How do you know my name? Why would I come with you-- you're a stranger. What do you want with me?"

Running to the other side of the road, I start to take off across the park. That's when I hear the strange man, from the car, running after me. He's yelling, "Mrs. Harper, I know about your mother! I know about your dreams!"

Stopping dead in my tracks, I collapse by the weight of all that has happened, "how do you know about my dreams, my mo...mother?"

"Come with me and I'll explain. You have a big decision to make, Mrs. Harper. You don't have to make it alone."
13.title: Help, by the way of a stranger.

choices: Try to fight for your freedom.....
131.content: I walk over to the man and enter the car. The man starts to drive and I got nervous as we approached a large concrete building. The man parked and ordered me to get out and go into the building. I got out of the car and walked to the large doors, I opened the door with caution. 2 large men grabbed me by the arms and threw me inside. The men picked me up by my arms and legs and carry me into a large white room. "These men don't look so tough." I thought to myself, "I could beat them up easily."
131.title: The Building

choices: 2) Try and contact the mysterious men who took me and inform them about this man
1312.content:
As the men carry me into a quiet room, I try and recall the events of the day. I remember no dream about such an event as is ocurring now.

Why do I dream of such mishaps for other people and not about my own physical well being. My mother's death affects me, but what new horror will unfold now ?

They put me in a reclining chair and strap my arms and legs to it. I am still in a trance about what has happenned, what is happenning. They talk in hushed tones, I don't try to eavesdrop. Suddenly everyone leaves the room.

The wall in front of me is blank, stark white, almost stretching out forever. A faint fragrance appears and I see the next glimpse of future events. Am I dreaming ? My eyes are open and I want to sleep. But I see a movie inside my head and I can't close my eyes, fearing it will stop the flow of cosmic conscioussness.


I wake up in my bedroom, covered in sweat. The windows are shut and I can't recall my dream. I should know, I could stop it. What if like all other dreams it has materialized into reality ? No! I can sense the chance to stop it. It is going to change history; why can't I remember my dream ? This curse has lifted and I want it back.

The phone rings. The man speaks in slow cold words. "Have you been to a special building today ? I need to speak to you. Can I come over ?"


Continue with your choice:
1312.title: The daydream

132.content:
I run as fast as I can, almost getting hit by a truck while running across a street. I hear the car following me. I'm trying to run faster, pumping my legs as fast as possible. People are staring at me, but no one is offering me help.

"Please!", I yell. "Please, someone. Help me!"

This just gets me more blank stares. Suddenly a black van pulls in front of me and I'm pulled inside. There are men with masks holding me down.

"We're not going to hurt you," one of them says. Stop struggling or we'll have to sedate you."
132.title: An Attemp To Flee

choices: Will she bust out the door and yell "Your not my father"
Will she keep quite about what she heard and use it to her advantage?
1321.content:
I keep resisting and struggling to get away from the men. Finally I felt a Needle go into my vain and darkness come over me.

Next thing I know Im waking up in a strange bedroom which was oddly cute and comfy. I get up to get a peek out the window to figure out my location.

My attention turns to the door as i hear voices coming from the otherside. I listen intentivly.

I hear one man say to the other "you cant keep her here forever against her will"
"we'll have to convince her to stay for as long as she likes"

"There will come the day, you will have to tell her you are her father"
1321.title: Ease Dropping

choices: You decide to ask your father many questions
You run from the man, not believing that he is your father.
13211.content:
"Your not my father!" You say, running out of the room to meet the two men.
"My father is dead." You say, staring at the man who resembles your father all too much.
"Casidy, I am your father."
"But in my dream. I saw you dead, covered in blood, and wet leaves."
"I wasn't dead. You saw it, but you read it wrong. I ran away, Casidy, I ran."
13211.title: I ran

132112.content:
You run away from the man and take off downstairs. The man, supposedly called your father, runs after you. You run into the kitchen of the house and grab a knife. You turn around to see your father behind you. He was about to grab you, but you hold up the weapon in your hand.

"Get away freak!", you yell.

This man comes closer to you. You....
132112.title: Running

choices: ...........ask why a cop just tried to arrest you
1321121.content:
You stab him in the gut. You push him down as he groans and you take off out the front door. A woman with a gun hits you with it and almost knocks you out, but you regain consiousness and get back up to your feet. The woman comes at you again, you realize you still have the knife in your hand so you try to stab her with it. The woman blocks the attack and you realize she is a cop. She grabs you and handcuffs you.

"You are under arrest. Anything you say........"

She stops as she is hit with a shovel. You see the man you stabbed earlier. He grabs the keys from the cop and uncuffs you. You......
1321121.title: The Getaway

choices: You wake up in the same place, the man is gone
13211211.content:
All you can think about is running as fast and far as you possibly can, so that's what you do. Just run.

The man you stabbed earlier runs after you, seemingly oblivious to his wound even though it must have been hurting. Somehow, impossibly, he catches up with you and grabs hold of one arm. You know he isn't going to let go.
"Get off!" You scream, lashing out with the other arm. The movement unbalances both of you and you fall sideways, him landing on top of you.
"Get off!" you scream again. A sharp pain makes you gasp. The world before you slides in and out of focus and you desperately try and get away. It doesn't work. The world dims and goes black.
13211211.title: Run!

1321122.content:
You break open the window behind you and begin to crawl out of it. The man grabs your leg, but you kick him off. The knife falls out of your hand and onto the ground outside. The man attempts to grab you again, but you kick him in the face forcing him to topple over the kitchen table and into the wall. You make your way out of the window, but you slip and tumble to the ground. Your head hits the ground and you are immediatly knocked out.

You dream of the man in the kitchen, he is on the ground and about to get up, when a cop breaks in. The woman cop comes into the kitchen and shoots the man. She grabs his body and carries it outside. She hauls it into her trunk and goes back inside. She runs upstairs and shoots 2 other men in the house. She puts their bodies in the trunk as well. She gets in her car and drives away.


You wake up. Scared, you.....
1321122.title: Your escape

choices: The man who said that he knew about your mom and your dreams saved you
13211221.content: You run back into the house with hope that your dream is not true but no one is there. "NO" you scream "NOOOOOOOOOOOO" you scream even louder." First my mom, then my dad, then three other random people (one of who claims to be my dad). You climb on to the roof. "I just don't want to feel anymore pain" you say and jump. You think your dead but someone was able to catch you and your life has been spared.
13211221.title: Failed Again to Commit Suicide

choices: ......try to get out.  You're not going to be an experiment!
1322.content:
"Mrs. Harper, are you alright?", one of the men ask you.

"Yes", you reply.

"We know what you can do"

"How?"

"You'll see, we are going to bring you to our laboratory"

You......
1322.title: In the van

13221.content: "WHAT?! IM NOT GOING TO BE SOME KIND OF EXPERIMENT!", you yell as you try to open the door to the vehicle. The man in the van grabs you as the driver tries to keep steadily on the road. You manage to get the door open, and it flies off of the hinge and crashes into the car driving behind you. The car swerves off the road. The van you are in begins to tilt. You see this as your chance to jump. The man behinds you reaches for a needle to sedate you, but you punch him. You lose balance and fall out of the moving van. You topple over the side of the road and roll down a steep hill. You gain control in about the middle of the hilll and stop rolling. You get up and look back. You see that the man is running down the hill with the sedation in his hand. You run away from him, down the hill. You enter the woods and find a huge rock. You....
13221.title: Quick Escape

14.content: Around the corner you see
14.title: around the corner

choices: turn around and she is gone
She pulls you away and you two run into the woods
141.content:
WHAT!!!!!! This cant be true!! Your mom alive?? You stare at her her lovely hair her glowing eyes. All you can do at the momement is stand there. She starts to whisper

" I can see you are a little shocked."

" Yeah iam shocked you are suppose to be dead"

" And no you are not dreaming iam alive and real as you"
" But why, how?"

" Well i faked my own death so that i can save you"

" Huh?? I dont understand"

Suddenly there is a noise you both stand still.
You then
141.title: Mom's Alive

choices: You can't seem to find the main street
You see the little girl again, blocking your way out.
143.content:
"Hello." She says, grabbing your hand.
"Hi." You say back.
The little girl looked about 6, maybe 7. She acted as if you two were best friends. She pulled you along walking this way, and that. She talked only breifly, and when she did she sounded faint, as if she was whispering to you across a crowded street.

She took you to an ally just past some old taverns and bars. This wasn't a place that a little girl should be, not even you should have been there.

At the end of the ally, there was a blazing fire lit in an old garbage can. Some old bums most have left it going. The girl sees the fire, and finds it interesting. She goes towards it, and sticks her little arm right down into the barrel. You quickly grab her, and try to pull her away. But she kicks you, with force that a normal little girl wouldn't have. The blow knocks you to the ground, and you stare at the child.

"See." She says. "It doesn't hurt. Being dead doesn't hurt." You see her jump into the burning barrel, and she is gone.

You get up, and run away. That wasn't a child, you say to yourself, that was a demond.

You run back the way you came, but...
143.title: The Demond Child

choices: Fail, but you have a good dream
Fail, and have an apocalyptic nightmare
144.content:
Around the corner you see a bar. Odd, you don't remember seeing that bar before. It must been built recently. You then decide to check the bar out. You then walk over to the bar. The bar looked liked it came out of a sci-fi fantasy world as you took note of the elegant design that looked somewhat futuristic. You then enter the bar and see several people chatting.

You then approach the counter and take a seat on one of the bar-stools. You notice that the walls are decorated with pictures of fantasy creatures and creatures found in science fiction. Just as you were about to take a picture you notice a ruggedly handsome man. You surmised he was the bar tender. For some strange reason you felt your heart flutter in your chest.

You nervously straighten your blouse. You can't put your finger on it but something about this guy has you flustered and in a good way.

"Hello their ma'am. The name's Randal Kravenoff. What can I get for you today?"

You begin blushing. His Russian accent made you faun over him more. After a minute you finally regain your composure.

"I'll take an orange soda with a ham and turkey sandwich combo."

"Coming right up."

You then sigh as Randal goes to put in your order. However, you catch yourself falling asleep. You try to force yourself to stay awake. In the end you...
144.title: Bar full of Mysteries

info.brief_description: You are your own worst nightmare.
info.description: Everything that you ever dream- good or bad- comes true the next day.
